name: Customer Abstract
query:
select 
	pe.party_name as 'Customer:Data:150',
	(select customer_group from `tabSales Invoice` where name = pd.reference_name) as 'Customer Group:Link/Customer Group:140',
	pe.mode_of_payment as 'Payment Mode:Data:150',
	pd.reference_name as 'Sales Invoice:Link/Sales Invoice:150',
	(select posting_date from `tabSales Invoice` where name = pd.reference_name) as 'Posting Date:Date:100',
	pd.due_date as 'Due Date:Date:90',
	pe.posting_date as 'Payment Receive Date:Date:150',
	DATEDIFF(pe.posting_date, pd.due_date) as 'Days:Int:80'
	from `tabPayment Entry` pe, `tabPayment Entry Reference` pd
	where pe.name = pd.parent and pe.docstatus = 1 and party_type = "Customer";
